name: CyberAssHacker Ludum Dare 48
description:
In this game you need to drift on the Lada 2109 to get deeper in a cyberspace.

This project uses: Commodore64 styled skin for libgdx https://github.com/czyzby/gdx-skins/tree/master/commodore64, Old Tv vfx effect https://github.com/crashinvaders/gdx-vfx
